name: C-Smash VRS: New Dimension
summary: C-Smash VRS New Dimension offers a whole new kind of Hybrid Multiplayer, allowing PS5 players to play with other PS5 players, but also across dimensions with PS VR2 players. Fully immersed and physical or in third person, complete with a multitude of accessibility options - a world first for a sports title.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: C-Smash VRS New Dimension - Date Announcement Trailer | PS5 & PS VR2 Games
